bike.description: OCLV Mountain Carbon w/InTension main frame, shortened 420mm aluminum chainstay, Carbon Armor, ABP Convert DH, Full Floater, E2 tapered head tube, integrated frame protection, internal control routing, HexMC carbon EVO Link, Mino Link, MicroTruss, 190mm travel

components.description: Rock Shox Vivid Air R2C, external beginning stroke rebound, ending stroke rebound, low speed compression, 8.5x2.5"
